title: Drawing, "Detergent Dispenser", December 13, 1956
medium:
pastel, graphite
Support: beige wove paper laid down
markings:
Marks: VIDALON-LES-ANNONAY-ANCne MANUFres CANSON & MONTGOLFIER
Stamps: Printed adhesive label at lower right: DONALD DESKEY ASSOCIATES INC. 575 MADISON AVENUE, NEW YORK 22, N.Y. [logo] D/D A
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center right: BERT YOUNG 12-13.56; at upper right on the board in typewriter print: Detergent Dispenser [underlined]/This detergent dispenser requires a/simple adapter to present plumbing/fixtures as shown./It incorporates the commercial detergent/container as the storagedevise./The simple control at the base of the/faucet directs the detergent through/OFF faucet or dishwasher cycles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Detergent Dispenser", December 13, 1956.
December 13, 1956. pastel, graphite
Support: beige wove paper laid down. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1528.
